.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit DataRowCollection extends System.Data.InternalDataCollectionBase

summary.span: 表示 的行的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of rows for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的主要组件 。The is a major component of the . 虽然 定义表的架构，但 包含表的实际数据，其中每个都 表示单个行。While the defines the schema of the table, the contains the actual data for the table, where each in the represents a single row. 您可以调用 和 方法来插入和删除 中的对象 。You can call the and methods to insert and delete objects from the . 还可以调用 方法来搜索 包含主键列中的特定值的对象，并调用 方法以在基于字符的数据中搜索单个词或短语。You can also call the method to search for objects that contain specific values in primary key columns, and the method to search character-based data for single words or phrases. 对于其他操作，如排序或筛选 ，请使用关联的中的方法 。For other operations, such as sorting or filtering the , use methods on the 's associated . ## Examples 本部分中的第一个示例将为中的每行打印列1的值 。The first example in this section prints the value of column 1 for every row in a . 第二个示例使用方法将新行添加 到 。The second example adds a new row created by using the method to the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将指定的 添加到 对象中。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建新的 ，必须使用 类的方法 。To create a new , you must use the method of the class. 使用 方法时，将 使用父级的架构返回一个新的对象 。When you use the method, a new object is returned using the schema of parent . 创建 对象并为每个列设置值后，使用 方法将该对象添加到集合中。After you create the object and set the values for each of its columns, use the method to add the object to the collection. 如果用户在事件中生成异常，则会生成异常 。Generates an exception if the user generates an exception in the event. 如果发生异常，则不会将行添加到表中。If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法将一个新添加 到 对象。The following example uses the method to add a new to a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用 方法， 对象所属的对象必须至少有一个指定为主键列的列。To use the method, the object to which the object belongs to must have at least one column designated as a primary key column. 有关 如何创建主键列的详细信息，请参阅属性。See the property for more information about how to create a primary key column. 一旦确定某行包含指定的值，就可以使用 方法返回 具有该值的特定对象。As soon as you have determined that a row contains the specified value, you can use the method to return the specific object that has the value. ## Examples 下面的 Visual Basic 示例使用 方法来确定 对象是否包含特定值。The following Visual Basic example uses the method to determine whether a object contains a specific value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将 方法用于值数组， 对象所属的对象必须具有指定为主键的列的数组。To use the method with an array of values, the object to which the object belongs must have an array of columns designated as primary keys. 有关 如何创建主键列数组的详细信息，请参阅属性。See the property for more information about how to create an array of primary key columns. 数组元素的数目必须与中主键列的数量相对应 。The number of array elements must correspond to the number of primary key columns in the . 一旦您确定某行包含指定的值，就可以使用 方法返回 具有该值的特定对象。As soon as you have determined that a row contains the specified value, use the method to return the specific object that has the value. ## Examples 下面的 Visual Basic 示例使用 方法在对象中查找特定行 。The following Visual Basic example uses the method to find a particular row in a object. 该示例创建一个值的数组，为表中的每个主键创建一个元素，然后将该数组传递给方法以返回 `true` 或 `false` 。The example creates an array of values, one element for each primary key in the table, and then passes the array to the method to return a `true` or `false`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用 `Find` 方法， 对象所属的对象必须至少有一个指定为主键列的列。To use the `Find` method, the object to which the object belongs must have at least one column designated as a primary key column. 有关 如何创建主键列的详细信息，请参阅属性。See the property for more information about how to create a primary key column. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法在对象集合中查找主键值 "2" 。The following example uses the method to find the primary key value "2" in a collection of objects. 方法返回特定的 对象，使你可以根据需要更改其值。The method returns the specific object letting you change its values, as needed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用 方法， 对象所属的对象必须至少有一个指定为主键列的列。To use the method, the object to which the object belongs must have at least one column designated as a primary key column. 当两行或多行具有相同的主键值时，将返回找到的第一行。When two or more rows have the same primary key value, then the first row found is returned. 如果设置为 false，则会发生这种情况 。This occurs when is set to false. 有关 如何创建列的详细信息，请参阅属性 ， 如果表具有多个主键，则为对象的数组。See the property for more information about how to create a column, or an array of objects when the table has more than one primary key. ## Examples 下面的示例使用数组的值在对象集合中查找特定的行 。The following example uses the values of an array to find a specific row in a collection of objects. 方法假设 存在具有三个主键列的。The method assumes that a exists with three primary key columns. 创建值数组后，代码会将 方法与数组结合使用，以获取所需的特定对象。After creating an array of the values, the code uses the method with the array to get the particular object that you want. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Find1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Find1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Find1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Find1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的位置 由中的行顺序反映 。The location specified by is reflected by the order of rows in the only. 如果数组中返回了多行 ，则插入的行可能不会在指定的位置返回 。If more than one row is returned in a array, the inserted row may not be returned in the location specified by . 例如， 属性返回指定插入位置的行。For example, the property returns the row in the specified insert position. 和 可能不会。 and may not. 例如，如果将的内容写入 为 XML，则 将根据指定的顺序写入行 。When you write the contents of the as XML, for example, , the rows are written according to the order specified by the . 如果为参数指定的值 `pos` 大于集合中的行数，则新行将添加到末尾。If the value specified for the `pos` parameter is greater than the number of rows in the collection, the new row is added to the end.

span.span: The is less than 0.

span.span: The to remove.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定的 。

span.span: Removes the specified from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 删除行后，该行中的所有数据都将丢失。When a row is removed, all data in that row is lost. 您还可以调用 类的方法 ，以便只将行标记为要删除。You can also call the method of the class to just mark a row for removal. 调用等同于 `Remove` 调用 ，然后调用 。Calling `Remove` is the same as calling and then calling . 当遍历对象时，不应在 foreach 循环中调用 。 should not be called in a foreach loop while iterating through a object. 修改集合的状态。 modifies the state of the collection. 你还可以使用 方法一次删除集合中的所有成员。You can also use the method to remove all members of the collection at one time. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法在对象中删除找到的行 。The following example uses the method to delete a found row in a object. 该示例首先使用 方法来确定 rows 集合是否包含行。The example first uses the method to determine whether the rows collection contains a row. 如果是这样，则 使用方法查找特定行， 然后使用方法删除该行。If it does, the method is used to find the specific row, and the method is then used to remove the row. [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Remove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Remove Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 删除行后，该行中的所有数据都将丢失。When a row is removed, all data in that row is lost. 您还可以调用 类的方法 ，以便只将行标记为要删除。You can also call the method of the class to just mark a row for removal. 调用等同于 `RemoveAt` 调用 ，然后调用 。Calling `RemoveAt` is the same as calling and then calling . 您可以使用 方法一次移除集合的所有成员。You can use the method to remove all members of the collection at one time. ## Examples 下面的示例通过调用方法删除中的最后一行 。The following example removes the last row in a by calling the method.
